author: Special Correspondent
text:
Banana saplings cut

Unidentified persons have destroyed banana saplings worth Rs. 3 lakh in two farms at Panankulam in the district on Saturday night.

Police said that the miscreants, who entered the farm of Yobu Ponniah (47) of Panankulam, sliced into pieces more than 500 banana saplings on Saturday night. They also destroyed more than 300 banana saplings planted in the farm of Murugan of Muthalaikulam. As tension prevailed, additional police personnel were deployed.

The police suspect that property dispute was the reason for the destruction of banana saplings.

Moontradaippu police have registered separate cases.
title: Miscreants cut banana saplings in two farms
